page.title: 17HISTORY OF NOMANSLAND CONT.
page.content:
The village but there was a dame school.A dame school is a cottage with just one lady teaching.In 1870 the Nomansland School was built ,in that time they had to sit on benches and write with chalk on a slate.They also had very bad punishments.
EXECUTIONS
People from far and near came to see these executions.These were ghastly sites but some people loved watching them.A very old man trudged to Salisbury to see them.A doctor passing through the neighbourhood was killed when crossing Wellow Common by a hatchet.It was hidden in a gypsies tent where it was found by a gipsy and he was said to have put it there and was executed.
